text: Knots Landing was an American soap opera. It began December 27, 1979 and ended May 13, 1993. It was a spin-off of Dallas. The show aired on CBS throughout its run. It was set around a fictional coastal suburb of Los Angeles and focuses on four married couples living in a cul-de-sac. By the time of the show's end, it had become one of the longest running primetime drama shows on television in the US. ==Other websites== Category:1970s American television series Category:1980s American television series Category:1990s American television series Category:Los Angeles Category:Soap operas Category:CBS network shows Category:Television spin-offs Category:1979 American television series debuts Category:1993 American television series endings Category:English-language television programs
title: Knots Landing
